Topic.Title: Is there a data limit for each Squiffy game?

Posts.EditableText:
After about 800 lines of text and code, the online editor starts cutting off text from the bottom. Not cool.

I love Squiffy! Please fix this. Thank you!
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
I use the offline editor. My game "StoreyMinus" was 40,926 lines of code. 

800? That's like being trapped in a phone booth.
